body:
The template system gives you out of the box two structs `Release` and `Chart` which get referenced as namespaces.

The thing is that when I saw the example below, I was not sure if `.Chart.name` came from Chart.yaml or from the `name` added in the values.yaml file.

```
metadata:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
   name: {{.Release.Name}}-{{.Chart.Name}}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
```

Then I noticed that the value in the values.yaml can be referenced as {{.name}} so I changed it.

```
metadata:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
   name: {{.Release.Name}}-{{.name}}  
```

I am wondering if in order to make it clear, we should enforce the usage of a namespace for the values in the values.yaml file we well.

```
   name: {{.Release.Name}}-{{.Values.name}}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
```

This way, there is an explicit understanding from where those values come from. The nested values can keep working the same way `Values.Mysql.name`

Also, the fact that this values do not need to be capitalized look odd to me although this can be another discussion. 

What do you think?
title: Values namespace
